text:
doc says:
The Digest authentication implementation in current Internet Explorer for 
Windows implementations has known issues, 

IE5 and IE6 have this issue, but IE7 doesn't.
creator: takashi.asfbugzilla@tks.st
noodl@apache.org
text:
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&revision=600245

Docs updated, thanks. The update doesn't include instructions for browser version detection as the hack is 
used as a fallback and doesn't get invoked by msie7's correct digest hashing.
